page.title: 06The running of Alstonefield
page.content: Parish councillors deal with small problems such as holes in the roads, lighting, traffic problems and visit places if something is wrong. They meet every six weeks when they discuss planning applications and also recommend what should be done. There is a lot of committee work at Leek District Council level - Health committee, Planning committee, which deals with home extensions, new housing and conversions, Amenities committee which deals with swimming baths, playgrounds and sports centres, Policy and Resource committee which decides how the money is to be spent. Staffordshire County Council deal with education, libraries and the fire-service in the whole county. Our County Councillor is Mrs Eileen Critchlow. Our M.P. is Mr. David Knox.
